  <script>
  (function() {
    var toggle = document.querySelector('.sp-nav-toggle');
    var menu = document.querySelector('.sp-nav-menu');
    if (toggle && menu) {
      toggle.addEventListener('click', function() {
        var open = menu.classList.toggle('is-open');
        toggle.setAttribute('aria-expanded', open);
      });
      document.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
        if (!e.target.closest('.sp-nav')) {
          menu.classList.remove('is-open');
          toggle.setAttribute('aria-expanded', 'false');
        }
      });
    }
    var nav = document.querySelector('.sp-nav');
    var page = nav ? nav.getAttribute('data-page') : null;
    if (page) {
      var el = nav.querySelector('[data-nav="' + page + '"]');
      if (el) {
        el.classList.add('is-active');
        var group = el.closest('.sp-nav-group');
        if (group) group.classList.add('has-active-child');
      }
    }
  })();
  </script>
